div.font:
stores the number of included pairs in the chain, and
currentEnd
stores the second element of the last pair in chain.

switch.text: chainCount stores the number of included pairs in the chain, and...

div.font:
pair[0] = 1 > currentEnd = -Infinity.
So, do chainCount++, and update currentEnd = 2.

pair[0] = 7 > currentEnd = 5.
So, do chainCount++, and update currentEnd = 8.

span.b: Final chain is [1, 2] -> [3, 5] -> [7, 8] and its length is 3.

switch.text: Final chain is [1, 2] -> [3, 5] -> [7, 8] and its length is 3.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
